text: Everyone who talks to their pets in a special voice.
Everyone who sings in the shower (bonus if off-key).
Everyone who has a 'chair' for clothes that aren't dirty but aren't clean.
Everyone who narrates their actions when they're alone.
Everyone who makes weird faces in the mirror.
Everyone who smells food before eating it, no matter what it is.
Everyone who has to have the TV volume on an even number or multiple of 5.
Everyone who still counts on their fingers sometimes.
Everyone who has a specific ritual for eating certain foods (e.g., Oreos).
Everyone who has an 'emergency' snack stash hidden somewhere.
